Name: DragonFangZ - The Rose & Dungeon of Time
About the game: Rose is a half-human, half-dragon who, along with her fairy godmother, stumbles into another dimension, known as 'The Tree of Time'. It is said that a great treasure of formidable power sleeps in the deepest depths of this dimension, a treasure with enough power to return a lost dragon-half and her fairy to their own world. Thus begins our heroine’s journey through the labyrinth known as “The Tree of Time”. If Rose is defeated during the adventure, she will lose all items and her level will be reset. Furthermore, the dungeon of The Tree of Time changes its form every time you enter meaning no two quests are ever the same. Your courage and growth as an adventurer will be the keys to this quest! Every decision holds a victory! This is a turn-based game. Rose and her enemies move in turns, giving you ample time to ponder your next action. It is wisdom and courage which will bring small victories here, ultimately leading you on the path to great triumph. The 'Fang' system: Rose can equip the Fangs of defeated monsters, gaining their abilities in the process. There are more than 200 types of monster! Fangs can be combined however you like: search for powerful combinations or just use those of your favourite monster. The possibilities are endless and each choice leads to a different adventure. The 'Brave' system: Unlike most rogue-likes where strategic use of corridors is rewarded, fighting in the open is key here! When the 8 spaces adjacent to Rose are obstacle-free, her attacks are more powerful! This overturns one of the rogue-like’s key fundamentals, breathing new life into the genre! And more..! Score attack mode Item storehouse Monster manual Achievements Mini puzzle dungeons Extended dungeon for expert adventurers
